Registered Office : Gurkhabasti, P/O. Kathalbagan, Agartala, Tripura (W). Pin : 799006. E-mail : twwsag105@gmail.com
Website: http://tripurawomenswelfaresociety.org

To
The Asst. Director [Handicrafts]
Office of Development Commissioner [Handicrafts]
Ministry of Textiles, Govt. of India,
International Craft Complex, Plot No.8, Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,
New Delhi-110070
( Through Assistant Director, Handicraft Service Centre, Lichubagan, Agartala)
Subject: **Formation of Producer Company under AHVY Scheme â€“ Intimation of Completion of Company Formation**.
Reference: Your Letter No. C-18011/01/2025-26-CC-1 dated 07.04.2025

With reference to the approval granted by your esteemed office vide Your Letter No. C-18011/01/2025-26-CC-1 dated 07.04.2025, we are pleased to inform you that the formation of our company, "NORTH EASTERN WOMEN HANDICRAFTS PRODUCER COMPANY LIMITED" (CIN : U13135TR2025PTC014611) has been duly completed in accordance with the guidelines and conditions set forth for implementation of cluster activities.

The company has been officially registered under the Companies Act, 2013 (18 of 2013), and all necessary legal and procedural formalities have been fulfilled. A copy of the Certificate of Incorporation and other relevant documents are enclosed herewith for your kind perusal and records.
Empower a Woman to Empower Next Generation
